baseUrl.description: base url used to create the user on. Can contain a path

preferredUsername.description: Add a preferred username. This name will be used in acct:username@domain and supplied to webfinger. Here domain is determine from baseUrl.

profile.description: New profile object for the actor. The fields.

autoFollow.description: Enables setting actors to automatically accept follow requests

UpdateActorMessage.title: Update Actor Message
UpdateActorMessage.description: Allows one to update the actor object

actor.description: The URI of the actor being updated. Must be managed by cattle_grid

profile.description: New profile object for the actor. The fields.
